channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Broken glass on highway, 1st November
item.description:
Broken glass on highway since reported on Thursday, was a much bigger pile but since reported cars have spread over the ares.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Hayes Lane, Widmore, London

item.title: Fence pertruding on footpath, 1st November
item.description:
Fence pertruding onto footpath. In dark I have fallen over and injured my ankle, others will do the same as itâ€™s poorly lighted in the dark.

item.title: Untaxed car, 1st November
item.description:
This car has been used on public roads without MOT since 26 November 2024. It's tax is expired and it has been parked in this road for the last 6 months at least

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 2, Frinton Road, Albany Park, Sidcup, London

item.title: Untaxed No MOT tow services abandoning multiple cars, 1st November
item.description:
The tow truck itself has no tax or mot and it is constantly driving around picking up other cars and leaving them on the birchington house side of the parking lot please see the people carrier and the black car next to the truck and the silver car

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Pembury Road, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: 7 Archer Street, 1st November
item.description:

item.title: Littering the front of my flat with Rubbish that can be taken to the dumpsters or the recycling, 1st November
item.description:
It has become a regular occurrence for someone to dump their rubbish in front of the building's main entrance, which is close to my ground-floor flat. Instead of disposing of it properly they leave on the ground for the foxes

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Whiston Road, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Drug user Paraphernalia and needles left within 53-68 Penrose House., 1st November
item.description:
Repeated visits by drug users to this block result in dangerous items being left on the ground floor to first floor stairs.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Carter Place, Walworth, London

item.title: Rat issues in St John's court, 31st October
item.description:
There have been multiple sightings of rats in and around the premises, which is causing concern for health, hygiene, and public safety. Given that the court is a public building frequented daily by staff and visitors, I kindly request that this matter be investigated as soon as possible and appropriate pest control measures put in place. Please confirm receipt of this report and advise on the next steps for investigation or inspection. There have been multiple dead rats in the court
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): St Johns Road, Northumberland Heath, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Flooding of road and footpath, 31st October
item.description:

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 1, Waverley Place, St. John's Wood, London

item.title: Bike parked in fire escape in block of flats, 31st October
item.description:
EPD-TDM Both my partner and I reported this to Lime on Wednesday but nothing has happened. The bike is on the 4th floor between Datchworth and Theobalds Court and is a fire risk in two senses - lithium battery and blocking a fire exit

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Murrain Road, Stoke Newington, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Serious flooding of road and pavement along frontages BOTH sides of the road making the footpaths impassable, 31st October
item.description:
This is the fifth time in as many years I have reported this problem and the Council seems incapable of taking appropriate action. The drains require plunging and the gulleys purged. Feeble attempts have been made to no avail and this is unacceptable.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 41, Carlton Hill, Maida Vale, London
Report on FixMyStreet
